class_notes: Registration for this class is only for students in the Transactional Certificate Program.
course_description: Team members prepare for oral negotiations, practice negotiation techniques, and draft transactional documents for various competitions. A student selected to compete is eligible for credit in the semester in which the competition is held.
sections: Class Nbr: 2716, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 7:30-9p, Instructor: W. Richards, Status: Open
